inclusion.criterion: Histological or cytological proof of neuroendocrine cancers
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Transbronchial biopsy revealed necrotic granulomas with multinucleated giant cells

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: He is treating with corticosteroid and cyclophosphamides since 4 months ago.

inclusion.criterion: Patients must have received treatment with at least one but not more than 2 prior chemotherapy regimens, including one regimen containing a platinum agent
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: He is treating with corticosteroid and cyclophosphamides since 4 months ago.

exclusion.criterion: No clinically significant infections as judged by the treating investigator
